Who are we

Cost of Living calculator was created to help customers calculate the cost of living fromone city to another. With Cost of Living Claculator now in over 50 countries in the world and steadily growing, the company has been able to reach a sustainable goal and serve not only as a calculator, but transform and adjust with the time. We help travellers adjust to their beautiful destinations, and make migration easier for them

Meet Victoria Friday

Victory Friday is an Entrepreneur and software developer. She has founded five start-ups although Cost of Living Calculator is her first and most successful

Contact us to make you adjust to beautiful destinations, and make migration in the best cost effective countries.
